summary: The Keep Our Promise to America’s Children and Teachers Act (S. 343) aims to fully fund Part A of Title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 and the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act (IDEA). It mandates increasing appropriations for these programs over the coming years, starting in fiscal year 2026, and provides a specific funding formula tied to the number of students with disabilities. The bill designates the funding as an emergency requirement and includes provisions related to budget enforcement.
